name: Chicken Manjoori
description: Spicy marinated chicken with a crispy coating, served with mint chutney.

name: Hotdog
description: Classic beef hotdog in a soft bun with ketchup and mustard.

name: Fresh Salmon
description: Grilled salmon fillet served with a light lemon butter sauce.

name: Veg Burger
description: Crispy vegetable patty with lettuce, tomato, and house sauce on a sesame bun.

name: Garlic Bread
description: Crispy garlic bread with a hint of parsley, served with marinara sauce.

name: Bruschetta
description: Toasted bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze.

name: Grilled Steak
description: Juicy grilled steak cooked to perfection, served with mashed potatoes and steamed vegetables.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta with creamy carbonara sauce, crispy bacon, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Vegetable Stir-fry
description: A medley of fresh vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and served over steamed rice.

name: Peking Chicken
description: A heartier portion of our spicy Chicken Manjoori, perfect as a main course.

name: Pasta Salad
description: A jumbo beef hotdog with extra toppings, served with fries.

name: Fresh Salmon
description: A generous portion of grilled salmon, served with vegetables and rice.

name: White Russian
description: Smoked salmon served as a refreshing cold drink option, paired with sparkling water.

name: Green Smoothie
description: A light, vegetable-based smoothie inspired by our Veg Burger flavors.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: Creamy mango smoothie made with fresh mangoes and a hint of honey.

name: Iced Latte
description: Chilled espresso with milk and ice, topped with a light foam.

name: Lemonade
description: Refreshing homemade lemonade with a perfect balance of sweet and tangy.

name: Green Tea
description: Hot or iced green tea with a subtle floral aroma and earthy flavor.

name: Red Velvet
description: Delicious salmon dessert mousse with a hint of vanilla and lemon zest.

name: Ann Pavlova
description: A creative sweet twist on the Veg Burger, using plant-based ingredients in a dessert format.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate ganache.

name: Cheesecake
description: Classic New York cheesecake with a buttery graham cracker crust and a hint of vanilla.

name: Tiramisu
description: Italian coffee-flavored dessert with layers of mascarpone, cocoa, and ladyfingers.

name: Apple Pie
description: Traditional apple pie with a flaky crust and a cinnamon-spiced apple filling.
